type: Hand Towels and Bath Towels Standing Offer
short_summary: TPSGC, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, publishes this request for standing offers (RSO) for the acquisition of hand towels and bath towels.
description: PWGSC, on behalf of the Department of National Defence is issuing this request for standing offers (RSO) for the acquisition of hand towels and bath towels including delivery to Montreal Garrison, Saint-Jean Garrison and Valcartier Support Base, as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirement.
tags: Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (CA-UK TCA)
full_summary:
# W3380-23FD05 - Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for Hand Towels and Bath Towels

### Overview

The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites suppliers to submit offers for a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) to acquire hand towels and bath towels. The objective is to establish a list of qualified suppliers who can provide these products to various military bases in Canada.

### Details

*   **Procurement Number:** WS4586333777
*   **Posting Date:** May 15, 2024
*   **Closing Date:** June 13, 2024, at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
*   **Delivery Locations:** Military bases in Montreal, Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, and Valcartier
*   **Commodity:** Hand towels and bath towels
*   **Procurement Method:** Open bidding
*   **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This request is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Alina Cocieru
*   **Email:** [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Firm:** PSPC
